articles.description: Healthcare workers across the U.S. received the first doses of Pfizer's vaccine on Monday.But it will be months before the average person can access these shots at their local drugstore or grocery store.Walgreens Boots (NASDAQ:WBA) and CVS Health (NYSE:CVS) e…

articles.title: This robotaxi from Amazon's Zoox has no reverse function - CNN
articles.description: This self-driving robotaxi from Amazon's Zoox can travel up to 75 mph and never has to turn around. Check out this electric vehicle made for crowded city streets.

articles.title: Want to know how much money Joel Osteen's megachurch received? - Chron
articles.description: The largest single-site megachurch in the U.S. received a PPP loan during the pandemic.
